ygData.subject: Tighter User-Agent & From requirements
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI, I ve added code which imposes a stricter requirement on the form of the crawl-order specified User-Agent and From HTTP-headers. The User-Agent must

FYI, I've added code which imposes a stricter requirement on
the form of the crawl-order specified "User-Agent" and "From"
HTTP-headers.

The "User-Agent" must be of the form...

  [name] (+[url])[optional-etc]

...and the "From" must be a plausible email address. 

So if your existing crawl-order configurations fail, this is why.

For our current test crawls, let's use the values...

<http-headers>
 <User-Agent>heritrix-aoc/alpha (+http://crawler.archive.org)</User-Agent>
 <From>archive-crawler-agent@...</From>
</http-headers>

- Gordon
